function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Viral rna extraction and quantification procedures","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of rt-pcr for viral rna detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of wastewater and effluent water with pedv and mgv viruses","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective concentration method leading to inaccurate virus detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate safety measures during the concentration process leading to accidental exposure to viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 rna detected in untreated wastewater samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Re-emerging zoonotic hepatitis e virus detected in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poliovirus detected during the global eradication programme","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of coronavirus through respiratory droplets and possibly via fecal-oral route.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in duration and magnitude of viral shedding in patients infected with sars-cov-2.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of coronavirus genetic material in wastewater, indicating potential environmental contamination and public health risks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overfitting of the model due to prolonged training","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unbalanced class proportions in the dataset","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in classifying faces covered by hands, which may lead to inaccurate identification of mask-wearing individuals.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to locate people without face masks in densely populated areas due to the limitations of the system.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"System failure when there is a problem in the network, leading to the inability to send information about violators via sms.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The system relies on facial image data, potentially raising privacy concerns for individuals whose images are used for training and detection.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of a facial mask detection system may lead to a false sense of security among the public, potentially reducing adherence to other important preventive measures for covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on a technology-driven approach without addressing underlying social and behavioral factors may overlook the root causes of non-compliance with mask-wearing rules.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Screening for individuals not wearing facial masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overfitting in the training data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuating testing loss and decrease in prediction confidence","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of images from different sources","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on convolutional neural network cnn architecture","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overfitting in the neural network","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of face mask compliance in public places","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of driverless vehicles for monitoring scenarios across the city","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of sensors and real-time monitoring may infringe on privacy rights.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time tracking of individuals’ movements raises ethical and legal concerns.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of interconnected devices and iot for tracking patients may lead to data breaches and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of insufficiently fitted face masks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient data sharing during covid-19 outbreak in smart city networks","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate detection and prediction of disease spread in urban areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on facial recognition technology for mask detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with cctv camera use","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on iot sensors for data collection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of novel coronavirus covid-19 causing a health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of deep learning techniques in object detection for face mask monitoring.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor orders.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"}]}
